00044 EGS_SPACE_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry* createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00045     EGS_Space *g = new EGS_Space("");
00046     g->setName(input);
00047     g->setMedia(input);
00048     g->setLabels(input);
00049     return g;
00050 }
